name: One Mans Sky
description:
One Man's Sky is a top-down space shooter inspired by the Star Wars Universe.

You are a pilot completing missions for , fighting against the tyranny of . You will be tasked to destroy enemy bases, capture areas, survive as long as you can, and engage large enemy bosses in combat. Make use of all your abilities and items available to you!

Good luck!

Brought to you by:

Daniel Liao, Quang-Minh Pham, Han Cui, Arthur Yin
